actions.text: Amendment SA 4085 ruled non-germane by the chair.
Point of order raised in Senate with respect to amendment SA 4085.
Motion to table amendment SA 4085 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 143.

Amendment SA 4085 proposed by Senator McConnell. (consideration: CR S5050-5060, S5062; text: CR S5051) To implement the recommendation of the Carter-Baker Commission on Federal Election Reform to protect and secure the franchise of all United States citizens from ballots being cast illegally by non-United States citizens.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4085 proposed by Senator McConnell.
Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Motion to table amendment SA 4085 rejected in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 48 - 49. Record Vote Number: 143.

purpose: To implement the recommendation of the Carter-Baker Commission on Federal Election Reform to protect and secure the franchise of all United States citizens from ballots being cast illegally by non-United States citizens.
